horizontals.word: A highly trained former-KGB assassin and former agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.
A superheroine with magical abilities and a prominent member of the Teen Titans.
A master marksman and former S.H.I.E.L.D. agent.

verticals.word: Played by Hugh Jackman in the movie, he is a mutant who possesses animal-keen senses and enhanced physical abilities.
Blinded as a young boy, he is a lawyer by day and hero by night.
A hero because of his artificial intelligence, vibranium-infused synthetic body and the mind stone.
Founder of The Avengers and CEO of Stark Industries.
A scientist that was exposed to heavy doses of gamma radiation.
The Asgardian god of thunder whose enchanted hammer enables him to fly and manipulate weather.
Kind of fairy (for instance in the LOTR)
